name: Lumenstone Adjuvant
description:
After you play an Action Card: If, while this card is on the field, you have already played 3 Action Cards this Round, draw 1 card and create 1 Omni Element. (Once per Round)
Usage(s): 3
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After you play an Action Card:</color> If, while this card is on the field, you have already played 3 Action Cards this Round, draw 1 card and create 1 $[K411]. (Once per Round)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 3</color>
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After you play an Action Card:</color> If, while this card is on the field, you have already played 3 Action Cards this Round, draw 1 card and create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color>. (Once per Round)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 3</color>
storytext: "May it be as a sun in your palm, lighting the way through the lightless tunnels and bringing comfort where all is dark."
